attributes.action: Suspend the 2016 parliaments summer break as a result of the brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The 2016 Brexit vote, the complete lack of any viable plan and the meltdown of the political system is all the evidence needed.
attributes.background:
Surely all party's must suspend their summer break as a result of the Brexit vote.
Far too much needs to be sorted and disappearing off on their jollys is an unbelievable show of contempt by our voted for representatives.
